text:
@FOX4 My fellow teammates.
We must crush the curve.
Read up on Judge Jenkins guidlines and do the basics.
1. Mask up
2. 6 feet or more SD
3. Stay home stay safe.

please lets spread the Word and not the virus!
@JudgeClayJ @GovAbbott @CityOfDallas @Dallas_Observer #COVID19 #Dallas
